page.title: 01INTRODUCTION TO HUMBIE
page.content: OUR SQUARE IS IN THE COUNTRY AND INCLUDES SIX FARMS.THE MAIN SETTLEMENT IS A SMALL VILLAGE CALLED HUMBIE WHERE OUR SCHOOL IS.THERE ARE ABOUT SEVENTY FIVE HOUSES SCATTERED ROUND ABOUT AND A NEIBOURING VILLAGE CALLED FALA WHICH IS SLIGHTLY BIGGER.THE SQUARE IS SITUATED ABOUT EIGHTEEN MILES FROM EDINBURGH NEAR THE A68 WHICH IS ONE OF THE MAIN ROADS FROM SCOTLAND TO ENGLAND.THE ROADS OFTEN GET BLOCKED WITH SNOW IN THE WINTER AS WE ARE SEVEN HUNDRED FEET ABOVE SEA LEVEL. THIS MEANS WE SOMETIMES HAVE TO MISS SCHOOL.IN 1983/4 WE WERE BLOCKED IN FOR NEARLY A FORTNIGHT. OUR SQUARE IS IN THE EAST LOTHIAN DISTRICT OF LOTHIAN REGION.THIS WAS A COUNTY WITH HADDINGTON AS THE MAIN TOWN UNTIL REGIONALISATION IN 1975.
